attributes.action: Carry a international investigation - Iraq Birth Defects since Fallujah bombardments  in 2004
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have raised concerns about the weapons used by American forces in 2004 - when Fallujah suffered one of the heaviest bombardments of the entire war in Iraq.

Why have there been so many new born baby defects since then?

We as the "British Tax Payer", need a international investigation into the cause! And we are not prepared to waste money to murder others, even generation of unborn children.

We demand answers!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
